column4: have a question of what is 'SMB host name' and where can I find it?
where can I find the address of this SMB?
To print to a SMB printer, you need to provide the SMB host name (Note! It may be different from its TCP/IP hostname!)
your smb host name is normally the same as your hostname (i.e. run 'hostname' to find that)... and you can find its IP address with nmblookup <hostname>
